Sentencas: Fuel flexibility, e.g. using reformate or syngas fuel directly, is one of the most advantages of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: However, the electrochemical mechanism of the H2/CO mixture, which is common and key in hydrocarbon fuel-fed SOFC, is unclear and relatively rarely studied at present.
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: This article makes Reactive Force-Field (ReaxFF) reactive molecular dynamics (RMD) simulations on the electrochemical co-oxidation of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni (nickel)/YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) anode.
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: The RMD simulations at different fuel gas components show that in the H2/CO/Ni/YSZ system the H2 conversion rate maintains the maximum (100%), and the conversion rate of CO improves compared with that of pure CO fuel in the case of 30%H2-70%CO.
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: Two ways of CO2 generation are found: one is that the CO(Ni) species formed by the adsorption and activation of CO on the Ni surface is oxidized by the lattice oxygen; the other is the oxidation of CO(Ni) by spillover atomic oxygen, which is adsorbed on the Ni surface.
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: It is worth noting that the effect of oxygen vacancies on the oxidation of CO is more significant than that of H2.
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: A viewpoint is proposed to explain how H2 enhances the oxidation of CO.
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode

Sentencas: The results help understand the electrochemistry of H2/CO involved fuel in the context of SOFC operations.
Titulo: ReaxFF reactive molecular dynamics study on electrochemistry of H2/CO hybrid fuel in Ni/YSZ anode
